item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi. My name is Thacher. I’m a UX designer with too many hobbies. Among them are driving, speakers, coding, and mixology. On this site, you’ll find a collection of ramblings about things that I find interesting, my professional portfolio, and a guide to being a competent home bartender. Until further notice, this site is still heavily under development and incomplete. Thanks for dropping by!
